## Logger.enable() method

Enable or disable logging

**Signature:**

```typescript
enable(b?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  b | boolean | _(Optional)_ Whether to enable logging, defaults to true |

**Returns:**

void
